Method Detail

getEntityInstanceById

public Entity getEntityInstanceById(int i,
                                    double x,
                                    double y)
Description copied from class: Mod
Called whenever an entity is spawned. It cycles through loaded mods, and until it is returned an entity. Use it in conjunction with the i value and registering entities so that
if(i==myEntityId)return new MyEntity(i,x,y);

Overrides:
getEntityInstanceById in class Mod
Parameters:
i - The id of the Entity to spawn
x - The x location of the new Entity to Spawn
y - the y location of the new Entity to Spawn
Returns:
A new instance of your registered entity
See Also:
SpawnerEntity, RandomSpawner, Entity

OnTick

public void OnTick()
Description copied from class: Mod
Called at the start of every synchronised tick in game, it can be used for almost anything.

Overrides:
OnTick in class Mod

OnRender

public void OnRender()
Description copied from class: Mod
Called at the end of every render tick, this is the main method used to add a custom render item to the game, since this will be on top of everything else.

Overrides:
OnRender in class Mod
